name: NUFLESH
description:
"Death to Videodrome! Long live the New Flesh!"

Max Renn, Videodrome (1983)

This game contains flashing lights which may be triggering to those with photosensitive epilepsy.

Additional warnings: body horror, illness, medical horror, cartoon gore.

Created as part of Scream Jam 2021!

This is a labyrinth-esque game in which a parasite attempts to destroy its host's body from the inside-out. Throughout the game, you see your parasite evolve and gain new abilities, as well as the ways in which your host reacts to you. I used a technique in which I animated brief, 3 to 7 frame animations to give all aspects of the game a "throbbing" effect, like everything is organic and heart-like. Keep playing to see your story evolve!

This game is best experienced with headphones or nice, bassy speakers. The soundtrack to this game can be found on my YouTube channel, or on my Bandcamp.

Controls: arrow keys, Space
